{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Beitai |model=D03 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date=10/2012 |fcc_date= |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=computer-on-a-stick |fcc_id= |ic_id= |us_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp= |pwr_conn=USB Female Micro-B |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |pwr_poe= |cpu1_brand=Allwinner |cpu1_model=A10s |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |cpu1_cores= |cpu2_brand= |cpu2_model= |cpu2_cspeed= |cpu2_cores= |fla1=4 GiB |fla1_brand=Hynix |fla1_model=H27UBG8T2BTR-BC |fla1_num= |fla2= |fla2_brand= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=1 GiB |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=H5TQ2G83CFR-H9C |ram1_num=4 |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 |expansion_pcmcia_num= |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if=USB (non-standard connector) |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8188EUS |wi1_chip2_brand= |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand= |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=1 |wi1_rxchains=1 |wi1_sstreams=1 |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none=true |eth_cpu= |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand= |eth_chip2_model= |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed= |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |addl_chips= |flags= |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux;;Android; |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui=48:02:2A |oui_eth= }} ''Mini PC for Android 4.0'' (aka SNT-D03)
"20120919 V3.0" and "2012-10-26" is silkscreened on the mainboard of the unit populating this entry. :"20120919-WIFI V3.0" and "2012-10-26" is silkscreened on the breakout board for the wireless module.
48:02:2A is a '''B-Link''' OUI. The module is almost assuredly sourced from them.
==Vendor links== [https://dx.com/p/beitai-d03-android-4-0-google-tv-player-w-wi-fi-tf-1gb-ram-4gb-rom-av-hdmi-black-199773 On '''DealExtreme''']
